name: White Turtle Neck
description:
## White Turtle Neck

When the winter winds are blowin' cold and fierce, this here white turtle neck keeps me warm and toasty, and it looks darn good too.

### Bumpkins.io

Deposit this wearable in Sunflower Land to equip it on your Bumpkin

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
